snippet: Representative Walter B. Jones agrees with an editorial about not delaying the departure of U.S. troops.
abstract: Letter from Rep Walter B Jones comments on March 9 Editorial opposing Pentagon's attempts to slow down American troop withdrawal from Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Representative Walter B. Jones agrees with an editorial about not delaying the departure of U.S. troops.
